name: Unmaking, Unmade
description:
Feel the weight of the remote in your hand, the heaviness of the batteries inside, the divots between each button.

Press one.

⏮   ⏭

Become dangerously infatuated with an eerie videotape (or don't) in this entry for sub-Q Magazine's Love Jam.  This Twine story contains small Bitsy segments, audio, branching paths leading to two different endings, and LOVE, "raw and unfettered," as requested. The prose wordcount (without macros, HTML, symbols, or repeated text) is exactly 992 words.
